name: Mario Gasparini
bio: Division 1 Defenseman at University of Vermont

name: Ryan Mansfield
bio: Help younger players who wish to play Division 1 hockey improve and develop faster, including 1 on 1 video calls analyzing tape, as well as phone calls to set actionable goals. Positioning, Hockey iq, and technique are all things that are going to be targeted.

name: Jack Malinski
bio: I’m a Division 1 hockey player at the University of Vermont with years of leadership and competitive experience. Before Vermont, I captained the Austin Bruins in the NAHL, leading the team to a near-national championship. In high school hockey, I earned All-Conference honors twice and helped my Minnesota team reach the state tournament three years straight, finishing second in my senior year. Hockey runs deep in my family—my brother plays for the Colorado Avalanche—and I’m driven by a passion for the game and a commitment to excellence.

name: Dawson Good
bio: I am a big and strong power forward who has found success at the Junior level (BCHL) playing power play and penalty kill. I am in my 3rd year playing D1 hockey, facing players like Lane Hutson, Macklin Celebrini, and Devon Levi in league play.

name: Connor Mackenzie
bio: Hello, my name is Connor Mackenzie. I am currently a NCAA D1 Goalie for the University of Vermont. Along with my own experiences as a goaltender, I have several years of experience coaching goaltenders at various ages. I love using my knowledge and passion for the game to help others achieve their hockey goals!

name: Michael Rubin
bio: I am a Division 1 hockey player at Sacred Heart University. I have been playing hockey for 15 years and have a passion for the game. I have a strong work ethic and a desire to help others improve their skills. I am a quick learner and a great communicator. I am a great leader and a great teammate. I am a great leader and a great teammate.

name: Duncan Ramsay
bio: Division 1 Hockey Player, NHL Development Camp Attendee (Toronto Maple Leafs and Washington Capitals). As a Division 1 hockey player with experience in multiple NHL development camps, I've honed my skills and knowledge of the game at the highest levels. My passion lies in helping players of all positions develop their hockey IQ, refine their decision-making, and elevate their performance on the ice. Whether you're a forward looking to create more scoring opportunities or a defenseman aiming to sharpen your defensive play, I bring a well-rounded understanding of what it takes to succeed at the next level. Hockey has taught me the value of hard work, discipline, and attention to detail—qualities that are just as important off the ice as they are during a game. My approach is grounded in these principles, helping players not only improve their skills but also develop the mindset needed to achieve long-term success. Unlock your full potential on the ice with personalized 1-on-1 shift analysis. Together, we’ll review your game footage, identify areas for improvement, and develop strategies to elevate your play. Whether you’re aiming to make the team, move up a level, or simply dominate your competition, this tailored session is your next step to achieving your hockey goals.
